recommendations: Animesh Sinha ‚ÄúI was fortunate to work under Bhomesh for a short period of time. I found him to be extremely supportive and intuitive to the needs of a growing team. He has the ability to connect with anyone instantly. This has helped him in building a good network of engineering talent across the world. His business acumen of the VLSI industry is also a big asset. I have learnt a lot of him in terms of client negotiation, team building and networking. I wish him all the very best!‚Äù

Hemant Kalamkar ‚ÄúI had an opportunity to work with Bhomesh. It was great to work with him. I found him extremely strong in "Bulding Trust and living to ensure its longitivity", secondly "True Empowerment to ensure next leaders are in making". He is kind of a person with whom we can hang out with and has lot of quality of thoughts built in as a leader which we can learn from him. I would certainly recommend him for any such role and wish him best!!!‚Äù
